ingredient-information.sestavine: Alcohol Denat., Aqua, Parfum, PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Triethyl Citrate, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Tocopheryl Acetate, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Citral, Citronellol, Eugenol, Geraniol, Hexyl Cinnamal, Limonene, Linalool.

product-info.opis: BOROTALCO MEN DEO ROLL ON ABSOLUTE INVISIBLE z značilnim moškim vonjem, z dodano posebno aromatično noto. Dezodoranti Absolute Invisible so brez aluminijevih soli in ne puščajo madežev na oblačilih. Deluje do 48 ur.
